citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15pm on
05/04/2016.
(All contact phone numbers were attempted and the licensee said he had work related duties and couldn't make it)
